original_title: Springboard: The Secret History of the First Real Smartphone
overview: A decade before Steve Jobs introduced the iPhone, a tiny team of renegades imagined and tried to build the modern smartphone. Nearly forgotten by history, a little startup called Handspring tried to make the future before it was ready. In Springboard: The Secret History of the First Real Smartphone, The Vergeâ€™s Dieter Bohn talks to the visionaries at Handspring and dives into their early successes and eventual failures.
tagline: How the early pioneers of the smartphone almost made it big
title: Springboard: The Secret History of the First Real Smartphone
